properties.areaDesc: West Carroll; Richland; East Carroll; Warren; Issaquena; Madison; Sharkey; Morehouse
properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued February 11 at 3:31PM CST until February 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE AREA LATE
TONIGHT THROUGH EARLY THURSDAY MORNING...

The Flash Flood Watch continues for

* Portions of northeast Louisiana and west central Mississippi,
including the following areas in northeast Louisiana, East
Carroll, Madison LA, Morehouse, Richland and West Carroll. In
west central Mississippi, Issaquena, Sharkey and Warren.

* From Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening

* An additional 1 to 3 inches of rainfall are possible in a short
amount of time.

* Areas of flash flooding are likely. Numerous roads may be
flooded and possibly closed. Structures will be threatened
with inundation. Moderate river flooding is also possible.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should flash flood warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING
